alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 21 at 11:51AM PST until January 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley and Upper San Joaquin River. * WHEN...Until Noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Avoid forested areas as damaging wind gusts will blow down trees and branches. Stay clear of power lines. Secure outdoor objects.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
